title: Slut Shamed: A Violent Circle Short Story
description: Over the years, I've heard all the insults. "That woman has been on more wieners than ketchup." "Her legs open more than a refrigerator. " Yeah, the neighborhood slut, that's me.  It drives some people crazy that I date and sleep with whoever I want. Men are allowed to do that exact thing without suffering the same judgment so I have no plans to stop living my life.  Relationships are not for me. I just have to keep that in mind every time that sexy, bearded, construction worker tries to make me forget.
author: S.M. Shade
